title: User wants to see Disabled List Tab on Transactions Dashboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with either a MJ or MN transactions permissions set 
AND user sees a "Disabled List" tab (formerly named "Receertification") on the Transactions dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the "Disabled List" tab
custom_expected: THEN the "Disabled List" tab should load

title: BOC Approver wants to approve MN transactions from the clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day dl, Place on 60-Day dl, Reinstate from dl, Rehabilitation Assignment, Transfer of Rehab, Transfer to 60-Day DL, or Return from Rehab tx has been submitted to BOC for approval
AND a BOC Approver is logged in and sees the tx in the approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the transaction in the Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Approve" button should be enabled
AND clicking the approve button should run any required field or "on approve" rules for the selected transactions
AND assuming no rules fail, then the system should update all of the selected transactions to have a status of "Approved"
AND the system should make all "On Approve" updates for all of the selected transactions

title: BOC Approver wants to reject MN transactions from the clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day dl, Place on 60-Day dl, Reinstate from dl, Rehabilitation Assignment, Transfer of Rehab, Transfer to 60-Day DL, or Return from Rehab tx has been submitted to BOC for approval
AND a BOC Approver is logged in and sees the tx in the approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the transaction in the Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Reject" button should be enabled
AND clicking the reject button should run any required field or "on reject" rules for the selected transactions
AND assuming no rules fail, then the system should update all of the selected transactions to have a status of "Rejected"
AND the system should make all "On Reject" updates for all of the selected transactions

title: BOC user wants to see list of players who are currently on Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND "Rehab Assignments" widget is available on the Disabled List tab on the transactions dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Rehab Assignments" widget
custom_expected:
THEN widget should default to show the MJ league players who are currently on Rehab Assignment
AND widget layout should match the wireframe and data discovery provided
AND once a player is no longer on Rehab Assignment, they should no longer be displayed on the widget

title: Club user wants to see list of players who are currently on Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club user
AND "Rehab Assignments" widget is available on the Disabled List tab on the transactions dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Rehab Assignments" widget
custom_expected:
THEN widget should default to show the MJ league players who are currently on Rehab Assignment
AND widget layout should match the wireframe and data discovery provided, with the exception of the Org filtered
AND club users should only see their own Org's players Rehab Assignments

title: User wants Max End Date calculated correctly for Rehab Assignment Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and viewing the Rehab Assignment widget
AND "Max End Date" column is populated for each player displayed in the widget on load
AND user was NOT returned from rehab and subsequently placed back on rehab with "Continuation of Rehab" as the reason
custom_steps: WHEN user views "Max End Date" column
custom_expected: THEN "Max End Date" should be calculated using 20 days for non-pitchers and 30 days for pitchers from the Original Placement Date

title: User wants Max End Date calculated correctly for Rehab Assignment Widget - Continuation of Rehab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and viewing the Rehab Assignment widget
AND "Max End Date" column is populated for each player displayed in the widget on load
AND user was returned from rehab and subsequently placed back on rehab with "Continuation of Rehab" as the reason
custom_steps: WHEN user views "Max End Date" column
custom_expected: THEN "Max End Date" should be calculated taking into account the number of days the player was previously placed on rehab assignment. (same logic as used in calculation when the 20/30 max rules are violated on submit)

title: Permissions - no MJ or MN tx Permission set
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in who does not have either MJ or MN Transaction permission set (basic or admin)
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view the Rehab Assignment Widget
custom_expected: THEN the widget should not be displayed

title: Permissions - MJ tx permission set only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with MJ Transaction permission set (basic or admin)
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Rehab Assignment Widget
custom_expected: THEN the Level filter should not contain "Minor" for them

title: Permissions - MN tx permission set only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with MN Transaction permission set (basic or admin)
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Rehab Assignment Widget
custom_expected: THEN the Level filter should not contain "Major" for them

title: BOC user wants to see list of players who are currently on DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND "DL Reinstatement" widget is available on the Disabled List tab on the transactions dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "DL reinstatement" widget
custom_expected:
THEN widget should default to show the MJ league players who are currently on any DL including rehab assignment
AND widget layout should match the wireframe and data discovery provided
AND once a player is no longer on the DL, they should no longer be displayed on the widget

title: Club user wants to see list of players who are currently on DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club user
AND "DL Reinstatement" widget is available on the Disabled List tab on the transactions dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "DL Reinstatement"  widget
custom_expected:
THEN widget should default to show the MJ league players who are currently on any DL, including rehab assignment
AND widget layout should match the wireframe and data discovery provided, with the exception of the Org filtered
AND club users should only see their own Org's players DL Placements

title: Permissions - no MJ or MN tx Permission set
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in who does not have either MJ or MN Transaction permission set (basic or admin)
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view the Reinstatement Widget
custom_expected: THEN the widget should not be displayed

title: Permissions - MJ tx permission set only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with MJ Transaction permission set (basic or admin)
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Reinstatement Widget
custom_expected: THEN the Level filter should not contain "Minor" for them

title: Permissions - MN tx permission set only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with MN Transaction permission set (basic or admin)
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Reinstatement Widget
custom_expected: THEN the Level filter should not contain "Major" for them

title: User wants action item removed when they attach a SFD to a Place on 60 Day DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 60 Day DL tx exists
AND there is an action item associated with that tx on the Club's Action Items clipboard
custom_steps:
WHEN a file is uploaded to a Place on 60 Day with a Standard Form Diagnosis label
AND the user saves the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN system should check for any action items associated with the tx
AND system should remove any Action Items from the Club's Action Items Clipboard

title: User wants action item removed when they attach a SFD to a Transfer to 60 Day DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Transfer to 60 Day DL tx exists
AND there is an action item associated with that tx on the Club's Action Items clipboard
custom_steps:
WHEN a file is uploaded to the Transfer to 60 Day DL tx with a Standard Form Diagnosis label
AND the user saves the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN system should check for any action items associated with the tx
AND system should remove any Action Items from the Club's Action Items Clipboard

title: User wants to receive error if submitting a Rehab Assignment for a Restricted player not Restricted due to drug violation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to Submit or Approve a Rehab Assignment tx for a MJ player
AND player's current or pending MJ roster status is "Restricted"
AND "Reason for Placement" on the restricted list is NOT "Violation of Major League Drug Testing Program" or "Violation of Minor League Drug Testing Program"
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve on the Rehab Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A player may only be placed on rehab from the Restricted List for a drug violation."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND clicking Ignore and Continue (BOC only) should ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: User wants action item removed when they submit a Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a MJ player is on a Rehab Assignment that is ending in 3 days
AND action item to Return the player from rehab has been generated for the club
custom_steps: WHEN club user submits a Return from Rehab tx for the player
custom_expected:
THEN system should check if any action items were generated regarding the player's rehab assignment
AND any action items found should be removed from the Club's Action Items clipboard

title: User wants to be prevented from initiating a Recertification for a player that has not been on the appropriate DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club user and is attempting to create a "Recertification" transaction for a player
AND selected player does NOT have a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL or 15-Day DL placement for the current year
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Recertification" from the "Create New" menu from player's player history
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "No re-certifications are required for this player."
AND clicking Back will return the user to the entry point

title: BOC user wants to approve a Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a "Return from Rehab" tx has been submitted to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Approve" button
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = RHBRT Description = Return from Rehab, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND If player’s MN roster status was Rehab 60 Day DL, then player's MJ roster status should be set to 60 Day DL.
AND If player’s MN roster status was Rehab 7 Day DL, then player's MJ roster status should be set to 7 Day DL.
AND If player’s MN roster status was Restricted/Assigned, then player's MJ roster status should be set to Restricted.
AND If player’s MN roster status was Suspended/Assigned, then player's MJ roster status should be set to Suspended.
AND Rehab Club should be set to null

title: BOC user wants to reject a Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user is viewing a Submitted "Return from Rehab" tx
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND player's Rehab Club should be set to value in history prior to transaction submission
AND pending Player History entry should be removed

title: Submit a Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Reinstate from DL" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND system should reload transaction in view mode
AND system should display successful submit blue notification #76
AND players Pending MJ Roster Status should be set to Active
AND an entry should be created in green font in player's Player History: Code = REINS, Description = Reinstate From {Disabled List}, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
{Disabled List} should reference the player's latest DL placement (Ex: 7-Day DL or 60-Day DL - including any transfers - If they were originally on the 7-Day DL and transferred to the 60- Day DL then their player history entry would read "Reinstate From 60-Day DL")
AND approval item should be generated and display on BOC - Minor Transactions = Admin's Approvals Widget
AND any populated comments should display in Comments column of Approvals Widget
AND clicking Player Name hyperlink should open the Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Type hyperlink will open submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: Receive error if attempting to reinstate a player that has stats from a game played on or after their original placement date to before the entered reinstatement date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to Submit or Approve a Reinstate from DL tx
AND selected player has stats from a game between the placement date to the DL and the Reinstatement date on the tx
BUT player stats are not from games played while on rehab
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Stats have been found for player between his placement to the {DL player was placed on} on {DL Placement date} and {Reinstatement date}."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)
